TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PartialCachingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PartialCachingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PartialCachingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義中繼資料屬性，Web Form 使用者控制項 (.ascx 檔案) 會使用此屬性來指示是否會快取其輸出，以及其快取的方式。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that Web Forms user controls (.ascx files) use to indicate if and how their output is cached.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性類別標示支援片段快取的使用者控制項 （.ascx 檔案），並且會封裝快取控制項時，ASP.NET 會使用快取設定。The attribute class marks user controls (.ascx files) that support fragment caching, and encapsulates the cache settings that ASP.NET uses when caching the control. 網頁和控制項的開發人員使用屬性來啟用輸出快取中的使用者控制項的程式碼後置檔案。Page and controls developers use the attribute to enable output caching for a user control in a code-behind file. 使用是下列其中一種您可以啟用輸出快取。Using the is one of several ways you can enable output caching. 下列清單描述您可用來啟用輸出快取的方法。The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching. - 若要啟用輸出快取在宣告式的情況下，使用指示詞。Use the directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用啟用快取做為程式碼後置檔案中的使用者控制項。Use the to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 使用類別以程式設計方式指定您正在使用的程式設計案例中的 快取設定執行個體。Use the class to programmatically specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances. 如果使用者控制項包含指示詞，或有套用，ASP.NET 剖析器產生的執行個體將使用者控制項的類別。If a user control contains an directive or has a applied, the ASP.NET parser generates an instance of the class to wrap the user control. 如需 ASP.NET 快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce)。For more information about ASP.NET caching, see [Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce). 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用。The following code example demonstrates using the . 這個範例有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 部分類別中， `ctlMine`，繼承自基底類別和要屬性會套用。A partial class, `ctlMine`, that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. - 搭配使用的使用者控制項`ctlMine`部分類別。A user control that is used with the `ctlMine` partial class. - Web Form 網頁裝載使用者控制項。A Web Forms page that hosts the user control. 此範例的第一個部分會示範部分類別，繼承自基底類別和要屬性會套用。The first part of the example demonstrates a partial class that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. 在此範例中，此屬性會指定應該在 20 秒快取使用者控制項。In this example, the attribute specifies that the user control should be cached for 20 seconds. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx.vb#1)] 此範例的第二個部分顯示用於前面的範例示範使用者控制快取的使用者控制項。The second part of the example shows a user control that is used with the previous example to demonstrate user control caching. [!code-aspx-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx#5)] 此範例的第三個部分示範裝載使用者控制項的 Web Form 頁面。The third part of the example demonstrates a Web Forms page that hosts the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.aspx#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 duration) cil managed

param.name: duration
param.span: 使用者控制項應停留在輸出快取區中的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, a user control should remain in the output cache.

summary.span: 使用指派給要快取的使用者控制項持續期間，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified duration assigned to the user control to be cached.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構函式可以套用至使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在範例中，建構函式用來指示使用者控制項，可以快取，並指定快取持續時間。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached and to specify the caching duration. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public PartialCachingAttribute (int duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 duration, string varyByParams, string varyByControls, string varyByCustom) cil managed
Public Sub New (duration As Integer, varyByParams As String, varyByControls As String, varyByCustom As String)
public: PartialCachingAttribute(int duration, System::String ^ varyByParams, System::String ^ varyByControls, System::String ^ varyByCustom);

param.name: duration
param.span: 快取使用者控制項的時間長度，以秒為單位。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, that the user control is cached.

param.name: varyByParams
param.span: 用來變更輸出快取的分號分隔的字串清單。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.

param.span: 根據預設值，這些字串會對應至以 GET 方法屬性所傳送的查詢字串值，或對應至使用 POST 方法所傳送的參數。

span.span: By default, these strings correspond to a query string value sent with GET method attributes or to a parameter sent using the POST method.

param.span: 當這個屬性被設定為多個參數時，輸出快取會包含每一指定參數所要求文件的不同版本。

span.span: When this attribute is set to multiple parameters, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified parameter.

param.span: 可能的值包括 "none"、"\*"，以及任何有效的查詢字串，或 POST 參數名稱。

span.span: Possible values include "none", "\*", and any valid query string or POST parameter name.

param.name: varyByControls
param.span: 用來變更輸出快取的分號分隔的字串清單。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.

param.span: 這些字串是表示使用者控制項上屬性的完整名稱。

span.span: These strings represent fully qualified names of properties on a user control.

param.span: 當這個參數使用於使用者控制項時，使用者控制項輸出會針對每一個指定使用者控制項屬性的快取而改變。

span.span: When this parameter is used for a user control, the user control output is varied to the cache for each specified user control property.

param.name: varyByCustom
param.span: 表示自訂輸出快取需求的任何文字。

span.span: Any text that represents custom output caching requirements.

param.span: 如果這個參數取得 "browser" 的值設，則快取會根據瀏覽器名稱和主要版本資訊而有所不同。

span.span: If this parameter is given a value of "browser", the cache is varied by browser name and major version information.

param.span: 如果自訂字串已輸入，則您必須在您應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中覆寫 方法。

span.span: If a custom string is entered, you must override the method in your application's Global.asax file.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定快取期間、任何的 GET 和 POST 值、控制項名稱以及用來變更快取的自訂輸出快取需求。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the caching duration, any GET and POST values, control names, and custom output caching requirements used to vary the cache.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構函式可以套用至使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在範例中，建構函式用來表示，就可以快取使用者控制項，指定快取持續時間為 20 秒，並指定控制項，名為`state`的使用者控制輸出改變。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached, specify the caching duration as 20 seconds, and specify a control named `state` for which the user control output will be varied. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/CS/partialcache_1cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/VB/partialcache_1vb.ascx.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定快取期間、任何的 和 值、控制項名稱、用來變更快取的自訂輸出快取需求，以及使用者控制項輸出是否可以與多個頁面共用。

span.span: A delimited list of database names and table names that, when changed, explicitly expire a cache entry in the ASP.NET cache.

span.span: These database names match those SQL Server cache dependencies identified in your Web configuration section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Duration { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得快取項目應停留在輸出快取區中的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets the amount of time, in seconds, that cached items should remain in the output cache.

value.span: 使用者控制項應停留在輸出快取區中的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, a user control should remain in the output cache.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構函式可以套用至使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 此屬性會指出使用者控制項可以快取，並指定快取持續時間 20 秒。The attribute indicates that the user control can be cached and specifies a 20 second caching duration. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/CS/partialcache.cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_1/VB/partialcache.vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定提供者名稱，這個名稱用來儲存關聯控制項的輸出快取資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the provider that is used to store the output-cached data for the associated control.
The name of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定此屬性，以宣告方式或使用屬性。You can set this property declaratively or by using an attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shared { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示使用者控制項輸出是否可與多個頁面共用。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether user control output can be shared with multiple pages.

value.span: 如果使用者控制項輸出可以在多個網頁之間共用，為 ；否則，即為 。

span.span: if user control output can be shared between multiple pages; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`、 快取多個 Web Form 網頁可以存取使用者控制項的輸出。If you set this property to `true`, cached user control output can be accessed by multiple Web Forms pages. 如果您沒有設定它`true`，預設行為是快取包含使用者控制項的每個頁面的使用者控制輸出的一個版本。If you do not set it to `true`, the default behavior is to cache one version of user control output for each page that contains that user control. 您可能可以啟用此屬性，以儲存大量的記憶體。You can potentially save a significant amount of memory by enabling this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlDependency { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得分隔的字串，以識別快取的使用者控制項所相依的一或多個資料庫和表格名稱組。

span.span: Gets a delimited string that identifies one or more database and table name pairs that the cached user control is dependent on.

value.span: 分隔的字串，識別使用者控制項快取項目所相依的一組資料庫和表格名稱。

span.span: A delimited string that identifies a set of database and table names that the user control cache entry is dependent on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串會識別資料庫和資料表名稱，根據您的組態中的 SQL Server 快取相依性的名稱 (通常使用加入`sqlcachedependency`組態項目)。The string identifies databases and table names according to the name of a SQL Server cache dependency in your configuration (typically added using the `sqlcachedependency` configuration elements). 如果您使用 SQL Server 2005 時，您可以設定"CommandNotification"，可指示 ASP.NET 建立發出之所有 SQL 命令目前的 ASP.NET 網頁的內容中的資料列層級相依性屬性。If you use SQL Server 2005, you can set the property to "CommandNotification", which instructs ASP.NET to create row level dependencies for all SQL commands issued within the context of the current ASP.NET page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByControls { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得輸出快取用來變更使用者控制項的使用者控制項屬性清單。

span.span: Gets a list of user control properties that the output cache uses to vary the user control.

value.span: 使用者控制項屬性的清單。

span.span: The list of user control properties.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構函式可以套用至使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在範例中，建構函式用來指示使用者控制項可以快取、 快取期間指定為 20 秒，以及指定控制項，名為`state`的使用者控制輸出改變。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached, to specify the caching duration as 20 seconds, and to specify a control named `state` for which the user control output will be varied. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/CS/partialcache_1cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_2_Resubmit/VB/partialcache_1vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByCustom { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得自訂字串的清單，輸出快取將使用此清單來變更使用者控制項。

span.span: Gets a list of custom strings that the output cache will use to vary the user control.
The list of custom strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您指定這個屬性的 「 瀏覽器 」，將變更使用者控制項的瀏覽器類型和主要版本號碼。If you specify "browser" for this property, the user control will be varied by browser type and major version number. 您也可以使用這個屬性來擴充輸出快取變更使用者控制項回應的值。You can also use this property to extend the values that output cache varies the user control response. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構函式可以套用至使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在範例中，建構函式用來指示使用者控制項，可以快取，並指定快取項目所依存的瀏覽器類型和主要版本號碼。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached and to specify that the cache entry is dependent on the browser type and major version number. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_4/CS/partialcache_3cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_4/VB/partialcache_3vb.ascx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByParams { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得查詢字串的清單，或是輸出快取將用於變更使用者控制項的表單 參數。

span.span: Gets a list of query string or form parameters that the output cache will use to vary the user control.

value.span: 查詢字串的清單或表單 參數。

span.span: The list of query string or form parameters.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構函式可以套用至使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the constructor can be applied to a user control. 在範例中，建構函式用來指示使用者控制項，可以快取，並指定快取項目所相依的參數。In the example, the constructor is used to indicate that the user control can be cached and to specify the parameter upon which the cache entry is dependent. [!code-csharp[PartialCachingAttribute_3#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_3/CS/partialcache_2cs.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PartialCachingAttribute_3#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PartialCachingAttribute_3/VB/partialcache_2vb.ascx.vb#2)]
